./src/api/v1/endpoints/reservations.py.description: Reservations API router follows the pattern from instances.py: uses APIRouter with prefix and tags, require_auth dependency for authentication, get_db dependency for database session, and service classes for business logic. Routes use Pydantic schemas from schemas/request.py and schemas/response.py.

./web/src/components/ReservationCalendar.description: ReservationCalendar component uses react-big-calendar with dateFnsLocalizer for GPU reservation scheduling. Props: reservations array, onSelectSlot, onSelectEvent, onCancelReservation callbacks, loading state. Includes dark theme CSS overrides, status/GPU color coding, event detail modal, and Portuguese localization.

./web/src/components/ReservationForm.jsx.description: ReservationForm component for creating GPU reservations. Uses Flatpickr with Portuguese locale for datetime selection, integrates with /api/reservations/pricing and /api/reservations/availability endpoints, and follows TailAdmin CSS patterns. Props: onSubmit, onCancel, initialStartTime, initialEndTime, loading.

./web/src/pages/Reservations.jsx.description: Reservations page component integrates ReservationCalendar and ReservationForm. Uses page-container/page-header CSS patterns from existing pages. Supports demo mode via useLocation() checking for /demo-app prefix. Includes stats cards, loading states, error handling modal for reservation creation.
